description.en: The first miner in 1-cell category to compete with 2-cell RollerMiner S9. 500 GH/s more power, less space on the shelf and killer-look - that's the Golden Abyss style. Take the best and beat the rest!
description.cn: 1单元类别中的第一个矿机与2单元RollerMiner S9相比，500 Gh/s的功率更大佔架子上的空间更少，外观更是搶眼-这就是黃金ABYSS风格。挖采最好的，击败其它的!
